thread.title: Retired WNBA star says she was bullied as she was STRAIGHT | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Retired WNBA star says she was bullied as she was STRAIGHT | Daily Mail Online

author: Hannah Parry For Dailymail.Com
title: Retired WNBA star says she was bullied as she was STRAIGHT | Daily Mail Online
text: Retired WNBA star says she was bullied and attacked by fellow players because she was STRAIGHT Candice Wiggins claims she was bullied by her teammates for being straight The star retired abruptly last year as she couldn't cope with the 'toxic' culture She says that '98 percent of the women in the WNBA are gay' and she didn't fit in Ex-New York Libertys star says she was often thrown to the ground and sworn at She said players were keen to show that: 'We want you to know we don't like you' 30-year-old added that the WNBA encouraged players to act and dress like men She says she was bullied because she wanted to embrace her femininity Published: 17:42 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 18:42 GMT, 21 February 2017 8 shares
